headline: Brown & Brown, Inc. acquires the assets of The Protectorate Group Insurance Agency, Inc., doing business as American Adventure Insurance
summary: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla., Feb. 17, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- J. Scott Penny, chief acquisitions officer of Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO), and Paul Bender, the owner of The Protectorate Group Insurance Agency, Inc., doing business as American Adventure Insurance (“American Adventure”), today announced that Brown & Brown Dealer Services (“BBDS”) has acquired the assets of American Adventure. American Adventure specializes in providing insurance solutions at the dealership for all types of vehicles, inc

(NYSE:BRO), and Paul Bender, the owner of The Protectorate Group Insurance Agency, Inc., doing business as American Adventure Insurance (“American Adventure”), today announced that Brown & Brown Dealer Services (“BBDS”) has acquired the assets of American Adventure.
